data.text: @itosettiMD_MBA Looks like there was just some modelling based on current data of effectiveness after 1st dose... it’s already under consideration...  looks like other provinces have already started with to not keep stocks for the 2nd.. https://t.co/i9NLtSv2Wf
@itosettiMD_MBA Can’t dig up the study reported here either... https://t.co/i0PeEZuCgl

@itosettiMD_MBA Is this a new trend now? In Canada the head of Ontario’s vaccination program is asking for single dose instead of storing the second dose for ones who have already been jabbed once... https://t.co/lHt8VTOflk
@itosettiMD_MBA @Cleavon_MD Tony Blair was never one that prioritised ethics...I guess,he hasn't changed.
@itosettiMD_MBA I really don't understand why this is a thing that needs to be said. Unbelievable.
@itosettiMD_MBA @Cleavon_MD "Tony Blair" should be a warning label -- on Anything.😬
@itosettiMD_MBA The published results that did meet the primary endpoint aren't enough, at least in emergency?

@jeremy_hume @itosettiMD_MBA Listen Catherine Hill : total lockdown for reducing viral diffusion while mass testing strategy is implemented. Some countries have done it and now they live a « normal life ». Lockdown for lockdown is a catastrophy, I agree.
@itosettiMD_MBA Staring in the lights did not save the rabbit

@itosettiMD_MBA You’re totally right but it seems that the situation in UK is totally out of control. SAGE is asking for a total lockdown and school closing for at least one month. UK gov choosed another strategy. It’s look like a poker game...

@itosettiMD_MBA Neglecting to use tested and proven vaccine schedules for no reason is NOT a good idea either.

#EverywhereButTheNetherlands
